name: Ribbit (SpeltIncorrectly)
description:
A game about a speed running frog.

Overview

There is only one level, but many different possible combinations of upgrades.

You jump from point A to B by charging you jump. Get to the end (at the right) as quickly as possible. You can sacrifice the number of jumps you have for up to five upgrades. You start with 100 jumps, and can end up with only 1

You can jump again in mid-air if you upgrade your flips. You can flutter in mid air for a bit with an upgrade in fluttering. You can upgrade the maximum charge of your jump, and also the charge speed as well.

Try to get to the end as fast as possible. Maybe you can do it in 1 jump?

Controls

Jumping - Left click to charge, release to jump.

Flip - Left click while in mid-air (requires upgrade).

Flutter - Hold space while in mid-air.

Shift - Zoom out.

Tips

There are hidden easter eggs.

If you bang your head on a block, or bounce on a bouncy block, or slide off an ice block, you recharge your flips and flutters.

Try to complete the game in 1 jump.

Credits

Everything Else - Me
